HTC Website UI Design Guideline

Responsive breakpoints

Desktop

  • screen size >= 1200px (-xl-)
  • screen size >= 992px (-lg-)

Tablet

  • screen size >= 768px (-md-)
  • screen size >= 576px (-sm-)

Mobile

  • screen size < 576px
